channel.title: Language change
channel.description:
Hey guys,
My pc is in english but my locale is set to spain since that´s where I live, I rather not change that if I don´t have to so on steam normally I just right click on games, click properties and change the lang option to english, black mesa however doesnt have that option nor does it in-game, any idea how I can set it to english? granted the voices may be in english but text comes up in spanish

item.title: Language change
item.dc:creator: aldaris
item.description:
Changing the steam general langage in English worked for me, if it’s already set try to switch and set english again.
My setting for the voice langage In-Game seems to be in fact the subtitles langage, with steam in english this may display “english”
